DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety , tolerability , effectiveness 2 dose level LX6171 give 28 day patient Age Associated Memory Impairment ( AAMI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study LX6171 Elderly Volunteers With Age Associated Memory Impairment
DOC.criteria: Males female age 6080 year old . Complaints memory loss everyday life Nonsmokers light smoker ( 10 cigarettes/day ) Negative urine screen drug abuse Ability provide write informed consent History evidence disease , disorder injury could cause cognitive deterioration . Need medication hormone replacement therapy , daily vitamin , overthecounter pain killer Clinically significant abnormality electrocardiogram History alcoholism drug dependence Use dietary supplement contain Huperzine A , gingko biloba , phosphatidylserine , Docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA )
